name: §a§l§nSoulbinding
description:
You can apply catalysts to items with maximum enchantment levels to increase them further and apply §eMending§r, at the cost of 15 experience levels, up to twice per item (once per enchantment). These items will be soulbound to you, preventing other players from using them.
Consuming a §eNether Star§r and 50 experience levels will remove the experience costs of §aTransmutation§r and §aEthereal Form§r's cooldown reduction and duration increase.

badges.text: §d/trigger catalysts§r will show information about catalysts and soulbinding.
After consuming a §eNether Star§r, you will emit cosmetic particles.

Players that equip soulbound items in their mainhand, offhand, or armor slots will receive glowing and blindness and be unable to attack, use items, or break blocks. Items soulbound to you will have the same effect on you if you attempt to use them while not Fused.
§eProtection§r, §eFire Protection§r, §eBlast Protection§r, §eProjectile Protection§r, and §eThorns§r -- as well as any modded enchantments -- can't be increased using soulbinding.

actions.command: tellraw @s {"text":"You need at least 15 experience levels to Soulbind items!","color":"red"}
execute at @s anchored eyes rotated ~ 0 positioned ~ ~0.5 ~ run particle minecraft:dust_color_transition 0.75 1.0 0.5 1.0 0.0 1.0 0.0 ^ ^ ^-0.5 0.23 0.5 0.23 0.0001 4 normal @a
execute at @s anchored eyes rotated ~ 0 positioned ~ ~0.5 ~ run particle minecraft:composter ^ ^ ^-0.5 0.23 0.5 0.23 0.0001 3 force @a
